Information: Kambajala leaves are believed to have digestive properties and are used to treat digestive disorders such as indigestion, flatulence, and constipation,possess anti-inflammatory properties,respiratory conditions .
Procedure:
Digestive Disorders:Fresh Leaves: Chew fresh Kambajala leaves to aid digestion and alleviate symptoms of indigestion.

Decoction: Boil Kambajala leaves in water to make a decoction. Drink the decoction to relieve indigestion, flatulence, and constipation. You can sweeten it with honey if desired.

Anti-inflammatory Properties:Topical Application: Crush Kambajala leaves into a paste and apply it to inflamed areas of the skin. The anti-inflammatory properties of Kambajala may help reduce swelling and irritation.

Respiratory Conditions:Steam Inhalation: Boil Kambajala leaves in water and inhale the steam to help relieve respiratory conditions such as cough, asthma, and bronchitis. The steam can help clear congestion and soothe irritated airways.

Precautions:Use Kambajala leaves cautiously and in moderation, as excessive consumption may have adverse effects.
